name: my-claude-plugins
description: Custom Claude Code plugins for productivity and architecture

plugins.name: arch-patterns
plugins.description: Architecture overhaul plugin using 20 proven patterns from Game Programming Patterns. Analyzes codebases, identifies anti-patterns, and provides detailed recommendations for TypeScript/JavaScript projects.

plugins.name: research-framework
plugins.description: Hierarchical research framework using sub-agents for gathering, analyzing, planning, and validating research on any topic

plugins.name: automem-helper
plugins.description: Automatic memory context loading and usage guidance for AutoMem MCP. Includes SessionStart hook for repo-specific recall and skill for memory best practices.

plugins.name: sop-manager
plugins.description: Creates, maintains, and iterates on SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures) using multi-agent workflows. Integrates with Obsidian vaults and leverages research-framework for research tasks.
